title: SOUND OFF - OCT. 22
text:
By DONOVAN KLEIN - 21ALIVE October 22, 2015 Updated Oct 22, 2015 at 8:25 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, IND (21ALIVE) - In the Oct. 22 episode of Parkview Sports Medicine Sound Off, 21Alive's Tommy Schoegler and Kent Hormann are live from the SportONE/Parkview Fieldhouse. 
The guys discuss "the fake-punt heard 'round the world" as they look at who is to blame for the Colt's bad play call. Does head coach Chuck Pagano deserve to lose his job over this eye-sore of a play? 
Digital Daily â€“ subscribe to our daily newsletter 
Also, the Cubs have officially been eliminated from the playoffs. They did not come very close to winning even one game in the NLCS, but does this years performance actually give Cubs' fans something to look forward to next season? 
Plus, Fort Wayne's own Eric Wedge calls into the show. The former manager of the Cleveland Indians and Seatle Mariners weighs in on how the MLB playoffs are shaping up this year.
